topic.title: How to Create and Open Documents for Configured Plugins

body.p: The has a user-friendly Dashboard and if a particular plugin registers a create or open action, then it will include sections for creating and opening documents for plugin integrations.
body.section:
Create a New DocumentTo create a new document, follow these steps:
Go to your Dashboard page.
Click the New Document action in the New section. This opens a dialog box that allows you to select a new file template.
Select a file template click OK. This opens a dialog box that allows you browse for a destination path.
Select a destination path and name for the new document. The new document will be opened in a new tab.

Open a DocumentTo open a document, follow these steps:
Go to your Dashboard page.
Click the Open Document action in the Open section. This opens a dialog box that allows you to browse for a file.
Select the file and click OK. The selected document will be opened in a new tab.
